resources.string:
A carer support worker will have recommended this application to you. They recognise that carers often forget to look after themselves. This app has been designed to encourage you to do this. 

 Occasionally it will nudge you to keep in contact with people you like to speak to, or to pursue activities with them. It will also make you aware of new local groups with similar interests to yourself. 

 If you consent to this, enter your first name below then click 'Save'

Set up your primary care network on the next three screens. Do this initially with your carer support worker. 
 Once saved you can change these at any time.

 Who do you like to talk to?
Your carer support worker will let you know what level of activity is good for your wellbeing. \n Please enter it below then click \'Save\'.\n
Just to let you know I am
